text: "Everytime You Go Away" is a song by Hall & Oates and is the ninth track from their ninth studio album Voices. It was not released a single. ==Paul Young version== In 1985, English singer Paul Young covered "Every Time You Go Away" for his second studio album The Secret of Association. It went to number 1 in the United States and Canada, number 4 in the United Kingdom, number 20 in Australia, number 16 in the Netherlands and France and number 2 in Norway and Ireland. ===Track listings=== ; 7" single # "Everytime You Go Away" – 4:15 # "This Means Anything" – 3:13 ; 12" maxi # "Everytiime You Go Away" (extended version) – 7:32 # "This Means Anything" – 3:13 ; 15" album # "Everytime You Go Away" – 4:28 ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Hall & Oates songs Category:Paul Young songs Category:George Benson songs Category:Al Jarreau songs Category:Gloria Gaynor songs Category:Blue-eyed soul songs
